block.p: Marcy Gail Dworkin, the daughter of Linda Dworkin of Secaucus, N.J., and Lawrence Dworkin of New York, was married yesterday evening to Steven Keith Geller, the son of Herbert Geller of North Bellmore, N.Y., and the late Arlene Geller. Rabbi Robert A. Raab performed the ceremony at the Stony Hill Inn in Hackensack, N.J.

Mrs. Geller, 27, is an associate at Simpson Thacher & Barlett, the New York law firm. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania. She received a doctorate in law magna cum laude and a master of laws in taxation from New York University.

Marcy Gail Dworkin, the daughter of Linda Dworkin of Secaucus, N.J., and Lawrence Dworkin of New York, was married yesterday evening to Steven Keith Geller, the son of Herbert Geller of North Bellmore, N.Y., and the late Arlene Geller. Rabbi Robert A. Raab performed the ceremony at the Stony Hill Inn in Hackensack, N.J.

Mrs. Geller, 27, is an associate at Simpson Thacher & Barlett, the New York law firm. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania. She received a doctorate in law magna cum laude and a master of laws in taxation from New York University.
The bridegroom, 28, is a vice president for mergers and acquisitions at Credit Suisse First Boston, the investment bank in New York. He graduated cum laude from Duke.
